markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phoenix Flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1026)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 174 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Once you ingest this strongly spiced, glowing red potion, blazing wings of a [phoenix](/Monsters.aspx?ID=330) sprout from your back and carry you through the air. For 1 minute, you gain a [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal 3d4 fire damage to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation at the end of your movement (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Phoenix Flask
